medicines.name: Ibuprofen
medicines.instructions: Take with food to avoid stomach upset

medicines.name: Acetaminophen
medicines.instructions: Do not exceed 8 tablets per day

instructions: Continue physical therapy exercises. Apply ice for 15 minutes after activity. Return if pain persists beyond 2 weeks.

medicines.name: Lisinopril
medicines.instructions: Take in the morning with or without food

medicines.name: Metformin
medicines.instructions: Take with meals to reduce stomach upset

instructions: Monitor blood pressure daily. Continue low-sodium diet. Schedule follow-up in 4 weeks for medication adjustment if needed.

medicines.name: Albuterol Inhaler
medicines.instructions: Use before exercise or when experiencing breathing difficulty

instructions: Keep inhaler with you at all times. Rinse mouth after use. Avoid known triggers like dust and pollen.

medicines.name: Hydrocortisone Cream
medicines.instructions: Apply thin layer to affected area only

instructions: Avoid sun exposure on treated areas. Use gentle, fragrance-free moisturizer. Return if condition worsens.
